statements: SELECT * FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_location FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, contact_person FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, contact_person FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT COUNT(provider_id) AS total_providers FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_location = 'Los Angeles' AND provider_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT * FROM third_party_logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM third_party_logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM shipment_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_contact_person, provider_phone_number FROM third_party_logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM shipment_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM third_party_logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM third_party_logistics_providers WHERE provider_phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_details FROM shipment_orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email, Count(*) FROM third_party_logistics_providers GROUP BY provider_name, provider_email;
SELECT * FROM shipment_orders INNER JOIN third_party_logistics_providers ON shipment_orders.provider_id = third_party_logistics_providers.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_contact FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT order_id, order_total FROM customer_orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address, provider_contact FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address, shipment_status FROM logistics_providers JOIN order_shipments ON logistics_providers.provider_id = order_shipments.provider_id;
SELECT customer_id, order_total FROM customer_orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, phone_number FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT shipment_id, recipient_name FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, quantity, weight FROM shipment_details WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT shipments.*, shipment_details.item_description FROM shipments JOIN shipment_details ON shipments.shipment_id = shipment_details.shipment_id WHERE shipments.status = 'Pending';

SELECT shipments.shipment_id, shipments.recipient_name, delivery_updates.update_message, delivery_updates.update_timestamp FROM shipments LEFT JOIN delivery_updates ON shipments.shipment_id = delivery_updates.shipment_id WHERE shipments.provider_id = 2;

SELECT provider_name, COUNT(shipment_id) AS total_shipments FROM logistics_providers JOIN shipments ON logistics_providers.provider_id = shipments.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name ORDER BY total_shipments DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, email FROM third_party_logistics_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date, status FROM logistics_orders WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM warehouses ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM third_party_logistics_providers WHERE provider_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM logistics_orders WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, od.quantity, p.price FROM order_details od JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT l.order_id, l.status, w.location FROM logistics_orders l JOIN warehouses w ON l.provider_id = w.warehouse_id;
